original_title: Marilyn Hotchkiss' Ballroom Dancing & Charm School
overview: Frank Keane, a baker by trade, has been consumed by grief over his wife's untimely death. But everything changes when he pulls his bread truck over on a rural highway to help a dying stranger entangled in a car wreck, who was on his way to a fateful reunion.
tagline: One man's dream, another man's destiny.
title: Marilyn Hotchkiss' Ballroom Dancing & Charm School
